改变Alpha

01 Apr 2017

Reading time ~1 minute

改变父控件Alpha子控件不变

我经常用的一种方法

UIColor *blockColor = [UIColor blackColor];
    
self.backgroundColor = [blockColor colorWithAlphaComponent:0.75];
